DescriptionField.label: Description
DescriptionField.placeholder: Write a 150 to 160 characters description for your shop. This will be visible in the footer and will be used for SEO purposes.

ExistingShopUrlProcessor.label: Import
ExistingShopUrlProcessor.description: Add a website link and we'll import the content into the account.

AutoPopulateSampleProductsToggle.title: Create Inspirational Inventory
AutoPopulateSampleProductsToggle.description: Grant our AI creative engine to add 3 merch on demand products based on the assets you've uploaded to easily get started.

RemoveConfirmation.title: Remove Current {{type}}
RemoveConfirmation.description: You are about to remove the current {{type}} in order to replace it. Are you sure you want to continue?

PaymentSetup.title: Basic Payment Details
PaymentSetup.subtitle: Choose to activate any of the options below.

coinbase.tooltip: The easy way to accept payments from around the world. Instant settlement, low fees, and broad support for over +200 digital assets.

stripe.tooltip: Connect a Stripe account to receive deposits directly into an existing account.

paymob.tooltip: Connect a Paymob account to receive deposits directly into an existing account.

SubscriptionPlans.title: Plans
SubscriptionPlans.subtitle: Choose from the different package options below.

proPlan.title: Pro Plan
proPlan.description: For small businesses and teams ready to grow.

warnings.fillBusinessInfoFirst: Please fill in business category and description first

physical.title: Physical Products
physical.description: Add physical products by entering details like name, description, and price. Customers can browse and buy directly from your store.

digital.title: Digital Goods
digital.description: Sell digital products like eBooks, software, or music. Upload files, set prices, and allow instant downloads after purchase.

print.title: Print on Demand
print.description: Customize products like t-shirts that are produced only when ordered, handled by your print-on-demand partner.

nft.title: NFT
nft.description: Generate a payment link for any product, simplifying the checkout process by bypassing the storefront.
